events.message: I am filing a claim for a recent car accident that occurred last night at the intersection. My vehicle was hit by another car running a red light.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident due to the involvement of a vehicle collision with clear evidence.
An agent specializing in auto accident claims has been assigned to handle your case and will be in touch shortly.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and appreciate your prompt notification after the incident.
Please provide the police report, photos of the damage, and your vehicle registration documents for the investigation.
The required documents including police report and photos of the collision damage have been submitted successfully.
Investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident has begun with the examination of all submitted evidence.
The investigation concluded confirming the other driver was at fault, supporting the claim validity.
We have proposed a settlement that covers the repair costs and associated expenses for your vehicle.
The customer has expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and the handling of the claim.
Your auto accident claim has been approved and we are proceeding with payment issuance promptly.
Payment covering the agreed settlement amount has been issued to your bank account as per the policy terms.
The auto accident claim has now been closed following successful payment and resolution of all issues.
All documentation and electronic records related to your auto accident claim have been archived securely.
